title: Texas singer Sharleen Spiteri announces her engagement to celebrity chef Bryn Williams
text:
Texas singer Sharleen Spiteri announces her engagement to celebrity chef Bryn Williams The Scottish performer is finally getting hitched after a decade of dating Share Sharleen Spiteri is getting married   
Chart-topping singer Sharleen Spiteri - known for fronting pop group Texas - is engaged to her celebrity chef boyfriend Bryn Williams. 
The couple, who live in London, have been together for more than a decade and often spend weekends in Wales. 
Bryn, 39, the man behind Porth Eirias in Colwyn Bay, recently said he’s looking to make a further investment in North Wales. 
The chef from Denbigh made his name in London, working under some of the biggest names in the industry and then running a successful restaurant in Primrose Hill called Odette’s. Bryn and Sharleen have already enjoyed a 10-year romance (Photo: Getty Images) The loved-up couple spotted at Wimbledon in 2016 (Photo: FameFlynet) 
It was there that Bryn and Sharleen met. She told the Daily Post in 2008: “I bagged a Welshman. I passed him on the stairs and we got into a conversation as I had seen him on Great British Menu.” 
She also revealed: “He loves my cheese on toast when he comes in at night.” 
Glaswegian Sharleen, 49, revealed that her boyfriend had popped the question on the Chris Evans Breakfast Show on Radio 2. 
The Texas singer appeared on the show and her new bit of bling didn’t go unnoticed by the Radio DJ. The star has rubbished rumours that she's already married in secret 
“I’m taking a bit of a beamer,” she began. “After 10 years, he’s actually asked to marry me. 
“It took that blooming long. Yeah, Bryn’s asked to marry me. I thought he was having a heart attack. Who knows what spurred him on?” 
The Scottish star also confirmed she hadn’t tied the knot in secret after she was asked if she was officially off the market. 
“Well, I ain’t married yet,” she quipped. Like us on Facebook
